entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 09:41 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
